title: S14 Ep105: Beyond The Fray to Bigfoot Encounters
itunes:title: Beyond The Fray to Bigfoot Encounters
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS goes Beyond The Fray to Bigfoot Encounters with Shannon LeGro.

Todays program features some personal eyewitness accounts and terrifying encounters, all from the case files of the popular INTO THE FRAY program. These stories are unique and scary. They will leave you wondering what this creature is and will no doubt give you pause before you cross the wood line and enter the woods.

Visit Shannon's site here: https://intothefrayradio.com/

Get the book here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Visit Medium Carole Obley's site here: www.soulvisions.net

Support our sponsors for great deals!
